marketing.noClient: At the moment you have no clients in the system
marketing.name: Client name
marketing.during: During the entire period of participation
marketing.promotion: The “Promotion Constructor” section will allow you to comprehensively set up conditions for automatically assigning levels to clients, on which the privilege in the form of bonuses or discounts will depend.
marketing.setup: Set up a Branch/Car Wash to participate in the BP
marketing.setUpAcc: Set up the rules for accruing, writing off and burning bonuses
marketing.rules: Rules for the validity of a gift for the number of visits
marketing.setUpBranch: Set up the branch where the Program will operate.
marketing.branchCan: A branch can participate in only one launched loyalty program
marketing.price: Price for service and number of visits
marketing.based: Based on these data levels are calculated
marketing.take: Take into account the purchase of related products
marketing.addCost: Add the cost of related products to the amount
marketing.when: When calculating, the part of the amount paid with bonuses is not taken into account
marketing.bonuses: Bonuses from the nearest expiration date are written off first
marketing.minus: Bonus account does not go into minus
marketing.whenRet: When returning related products, bonuses are returned
marketing.to: To manually write off and accrue bonuses, go to the buyer's card
marketing.cal: Calculated from the date of accrual
marketing.whenCal: When calculating bonuses, round up to a larger whole number.
marketing.whenWrit: При списании также используется только целые бонусы.
marketing.max: Maximum write-off percentage for payment with bonuses
marketing.no: Number of bonuses to be written off from the final price after all discounts
marketing.allow: Allow bonuses to be written off for payment with any discounts
marketing.corporationNameMin: Name must contain at least 2 characters
marketing.importCardsDescription: Import client cards from Excel file
marketing.templateDescription: To avoid errors during import, please ensure your Excel file contains the required fields in the correct format.
marketing.devNumberDescription: Device number for the client card
marketing.tierIdDescription: Loyalty tier ID for the client
marketing.useCorrectFormat: Use the correct format to ensure successful import.
marketing.importError: Failed to import client cards. Please check your file format and try again.
marketing.set: Set the minimum cost if you need the total cost on the receipt to not be zero
marketing.bonusesCan: Bonuses can be burned out completely, partially, or remain active forever. Set up rules for the combustion period
marketing.after: After starting the Program, combustion conditions cannot be changed
marketing.createTiers: Create multiple levels with different privileges.
marketing.toMan: To manually assign levels to clients, go to the client card
marketing.you: You can set privileges for one level
marketing.retain: Retain customers with payment benefits services, depending on the degree of their participation
marketing.award: Award bonuses for services, motivate them to come back to you
marketing.hubRequestDescription: Request to upgrade your loyalty program to Hub status. This will enable additional features and capabilities.
marketing.hubRequestCommentPlaceholder: Enter your reason for requesting Hub status (optional)
marketing.setUp: Set up events to award additional bonuses and discounts to the client.
marketing.if: If there is a conflict between the main conditions of the Program and the conditions for events, more favorable conditions apply
marketing.one: One-time privilege for registering in the Program
marketing.annual: Annual accrual of additional bonuses and discounts in honor of birthdays
marketing.setting: Setting up rules for free visits and scoring points for the number of visits
marketing.ifC: If the client registers at the time of service provision, a discount will be available
marketing.accept: accept for the next visit after registration
marketing.for: for one visit during the validity period
marketing.forAll: for all visits within the validity period
marketing.bo: Bonuses are credited and activated immediately
marketing.num: Number of visits to apply the event

marketing.filter: Filter data to display marketing companies
marketing.applies: Applies only to communications sent from the “Marketing Companies” section
marketing.list: List of clients in the segment
marketing.levelsAre: Levels are arranged automatically in ascending order depending on the condition of the amount of transformation of services and purchases
marketing.enterNamePromo: Enter the name of the promo code
marketing.launchControlDesc: Here you can start the Program, pause it, or schedule a delayed start
marketing.launchNowDesc: Check your settings and start the Program now or use delayed start

hr.if: If you specify a value in the «Percentage» field, the employee will be paid a percentage of each car. The total payment to all employees cannot exceed the highest percentage among all washers.
